# GetIOMemoryDescriptor

**Instance Method**

Gets the memory descriptor the stream uses for I/O.

## Declaration

```swift
OSSharedPtr<IOMemoryDescriptor> GetIOMemoryDescriptor();
```

## Discussion

This is the value provided to the stream’s initializer, or updated later by a call to [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream/SetIOMemoryDescriptor].

## Working with Memory Descriptors

- **SetIOMemoryDescriptor**: Sets the memory descriptor the stream uses for I/O.
